title: guys i need your help about mouse wheel
body:
i have mac mouse with no scroll wheel on it but as you already know it has touch scroll, okay so in game  it zooms in/out while im playing so is there any way to turn it off? please help me, im tired of playing like this

P.S sorry for my bad english

replies.body: I'm not suuuuuuuuper familiar with Macs, but I was able to find this article that goes over how you should be able to [**disable that scroll function**](http://macdrug.com/disable-and-enable-horizontal-scrolling-on-magic-mouse-how/).
